parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear drive bearing can cause the rear wheel to wobble, lose control, and lead to accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Grinding noise
vibration
oil leak
rear wheel wobble
loss of braking power
tire slip
and sudden failure of the rear drive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch hydraulic system can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Soft or spongy clutch pedal
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the concentric slave cylinder can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Soft or spongy clutch pedal
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
vehicle unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Drive Failure and Bearing Failure on BMW K1200LT Motorcycles
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear drive and bearing can cause the rear wheel to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially fatal consequences. Additionally, the failure can result in oil spills, which can further compromise vehicle safety.
symptoms: Thumping sound and vibration from the rear wheel area
intermittent noise and vibration
sudden worsening of noise and vibration
failure of the final drive
oil spray onto the rear tire and wheel
defective speedometer sensor.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the anti-lock braking system to malfunction, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injury or death.
symptoms: The ABS light on the dashboard flashes
the brakes may malfunction
and the vehicle may experience a loss of control or wobbling.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive can cause the vehicle to lose power and control, leading to accidents and potentially serious injury or death.
symptoms: The vehicle may experience a rubbing sound
followed by a wobble
and the rear ABS brake
rim
and tire may be covered in gear oil from the failed rear-drive component.
